Patent Information.Patent Title: Antimicrobial proteins, compositions containing same and uses thereof.
Patent Information.Abstract: The present invention provides purified polypeptides useful as antimicrobial agents. These polypeptides comprise human polymorphonuclear leukocyte polypeptides having molecular weights of about 25,000 daltons, 29,000 daltons and 54,000 daltons. These polypeptides have respiratory burst-independent, antibacterial activity at a pH from about 5.0 to about 8.0, at calcium ion concentrations up to about 10 mM, and at sodium chloride concentrations up to about 0.3M.
